Making sense of a newly assembled genome

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Making sense of a newly assembled genome](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/assembly/tutorials/ecoli_comparison/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
